content: NPR PS PP Pipe press jaw Press jaws for PP profile press fittings up to 2. Compatible with NPR 32-A pipe press tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Inserts for pressing, crimping & cutting ### FEATURES:Features Equipped with NFC tag for easier identification and management via the Hilti Connect app and ON!Track tool tracking software Press jaws for PP profile press fittings up to 2 Applications Pressing copper pipes up to 2 Pressing stainless steel pipes up to 2 *These values are system dependent. In order to ensure correct and safe pressing, consult the original instruction manual from the system supplier ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2217411 - Press jaws NPR PS PP 1 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PS PP 1 Press jaws assy - 2217412 - Press jaws NPR PS PP 1 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PS PP 1 1/2 Press jaws assy - 2217397 - Press jaws NPR PS PP 1 1/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PS PP 1 1/4 Press jaws assy - 2217399 - Press jaws NPR PS PP 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PS PP 1/2 Press jaws assy - 2217398 - Press jaws NPR PS PP 2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PS PP 2 Press jaws assy - 2217410 - Press jaws NPR PS PP 3/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PS PP 3/4 Press jaws assy
